sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词(动词)均有"叹息声，叹息"之意。
means: groan ： 侧重指因受到难忍受的精神负担或强烈的痛苦等而发出沉重的呻吟，也指显示强烈不满的叹息声。
moan语气比groan强，多指拉长的或连续的悲叹(声)或呻吟(声)。
sign ： 多指无意识地发出表示沮丧、悲痛、悔恨或厌倦等情绪的深沉叹息。
sob ： 指抽噎声或呜咽声，或边说边哭。

sentence.Network_en: You can go see him and have a good old moan.
sentence.Network_cn: 你可以去看看他，好好地诉诉苦。

sentence.Network_en: Suddenly she gave a low, choking moan and began to tremble violently.
sentence.Network_cn: 突然，她发出了一声低沉而哽咽的呻吟，然后剧烈地颤抖起来。

sentence.Network_en: I loathe negativity. I can't stand people who moan.
sentence.Network_cn: 我厌恶消极态度，不能忍受唉声叹气的人。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2013江苏高考英语_短语_必考点_试题 - 豆丁网 ... scream 尖叫 moan 呻吟 sigh 叹气.
M开头的英语四级词汇_百度文库 ... mixture n. 混合；混合物 moan n. 呻吟声 mobile a. 运动的；流动的.
求WOW命令大全~_爱问知识人 ... /Massage( 按摩) /Moan( 呜咽) /Moon( 裸臀).
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... mixture 混合物 moan 悲叹 moat 护城河.

list.abs: he holds in his arms , the moaning child ., 他紧握住他怀中呻吟的小孩.
moaning that you never cook dinner , and then getting all control freakish when you try to take over the kitchen .24抱怨你从来不做饭，然而当你试图接管厨房的时候变得歇斯底里。
an old man who still moans about his misspent youth ., 一个仍为浪费青春而痛心疾首的老人.
lately he has been moaning about his insomnia and headache ., 他近来一直诉说自己患了失眠和头痛症.
she is always moaning about her bad memory .她总是抱怨自己的记性不好。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'complaint or lamentation'): of unknown origin

entry.def: If you moan, you make a low sound, usually because you are unhappy or in pain.

example.ex: Tony moaned in his sleep and then turned over on his side...
example.tran: 托尼在睡梦中发出呻吟声，然后翻了个身。

example.ex: 'My head, my head,' he moaned. 'I can't see.'
example.tran: “我的头，我的头，”他呻吟着说，“我看不见了。”

entry.def: To moan means to complain or speak in a way which shows that you are very unhappy.

example.ex: I used to moan if I didn't get at least six hours' sleep at night.
example.tran: 过去如果晚上的睡眠时间不足6小时的话，我就会抱怨。

example.ex: They have been listening to people's gripes, moans and praise.
example.tran: 他们一直在倾听人们的牢骚、抱怨和表扬。

entry.def: If you have a moan, you complain about something.

example.ex: You can go see him and have a good old moan.
example.tran: 你可以去看看他，好好地诉诉苦。

entry.def: A moan is a low noise.

example.ex: ...the occasional moan of the wind round the corners of the house.
example.tran: 风刮过屋角时间或发出的呼啸声
远处车流传来的低沉的嘈杂声

means.word_mean: 1. an utterance expressing pain or disapproval

sentences.sentence: "The students groaned when the professor got out the exam booklets"

auth_sentence.content: Instead we had yet another moan about gay marriage.
auth_sentence.res_content: Instead we had yet another moan about gay marriage.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Instead we had yet another moan about gay marriage.

auth_sentence.content: No one had any cause to moan this time around.
auth_sentence.res_content: No one had any cause to moan this time around.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No one had any cause to moan this time around.

auth_sentence.content: People moan about foreign coaches but what are we exporting?
auth_sentence.res_content: People moan about foreign coaches but what are we exporting?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: People moan about foreign coaches but what are we exporting?

Sentence.sentence: trees that are dying usually give out a soft moan

sentences.cn: 那位生病的女人在呻吟。

sentences.en: The prisoner moaned a prayer for help.
She's always moaning that she has too much work to do.
sentences.cn: 她总是抱怨她有太多的事要做。

sentences.en: From time to time there was a moan of pain from the sick man.
sentences.cn: 病人不时发出一声声痛苦的呻吟。

sentences.en: They get fed up with her moans.
sentences.cn: 她的抱怨令他们感到厌烦。

jushi.english: From time to time there was a moan of pain from the sick man.
jushi.chinese: 病人不时发出一声声痛苦的呻吟。

jushi.english: They get fed up with her moans.
jushi.chinese: 她的抱怨令他们感到厌烦。

jushi.english: The old woman moaned in her sleep.
jushi.chinese: 那老妇人在睡梦中呻吟着。
